certs._note: Use --use-insecure and remove this part (the whole 'certs' key) if you don't want to use any cert

web._note: Use --use-insecure-web and remove this part if you don't want to use a cert for the web server

ws._note: Use --use-insecure-ws and remove this part if you don't want to use a cert for the websocket

voice._note: Use --use-insecure-voice and remove this part if you don't want to use a cert for the voice server

recaptcha._note: Remove this entirely if you don't want to setup it

sentry._note: Remove this entirely if you don't want to setup it

discord._note: Remove this entirely if you don't want to setup it

github._note: Remove this entirely if you don't want to setup it

spotify._note: Remove this entirely if you don't want to setup it

reddit._note: Remove this entirely if you don't want to setup it

twitter._note: Remove this entirely if you don't want to setup it

settings._note: Those settings will be editable through Admin dashboard
